PUBLIC "-//Stanford University::Hoover Institution Archives//TEXT (US::CSt-H::::Harry S. Kantor Papers)//EN" "reg_314.sgm" converted from EAD 1.0 to 2002 by v1to02.cdl.xsl (2004-09-16).

titlepage.titleproper: Register of the Harry S. Kantor Papers, 1948-1977
titlepage.publisher:
Hoover Institution Archives
Stanford University
Stanford, California
titlepage.p: © 1998 Hoover Institution Archives. All rights reserved.

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.abstract: Correspondence, writings, reports, memoranda, notes, legislation, and printed matter, relating to the American labor force, wages and hours regulation, unemployment and retirement benefits, encouragement of inventors in the United States, and the enactment of a minimum wage law in the Philippines.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: The Hoover Institution Archives only allows access to copies of audiovisual items. To listen to sound recordings or to view videos or films during your visit, please contact the Archives at least two working days before your arrival. We will then advise you of the accessibility of the material you wish to see or hear. Please note that not all audiovisual material is immediately accessible.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: For copyright status, please contact the Hoover Institution Archives

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Harry S. Kantor Papers, [Box no.], Hoover Institution Archives.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Acquired by the Hoover Institution Archives in 1981.

accruals.head: Accruals
accruals.p: Materials may have been added to the collection since this finding aid was prepared. To determine if this has occurred, find the collection in Stanford University's online catalog at http://searchworks.stanford.edu/. Materials have been added to the collection if the number of boxes listed in the online catalog is larger than the number of boxes listed in this finding aid.

chronitem.event: Staff, Department of Agriculture and other government agencies
Price analyst, economist, statistician, Department of Labor
Member, U.S. delegation to negotiate current trade agreement with the Philippine Islands
Assistant administrator, Department of Labor, Wage and Hour and Public Contracts Division
Analyst, Department of Labor, Office of Research and Development
Member, Department of Commerce, National Inventors Council

scopecontent.p: Correspondence arranged alphabetically by last name of correspondent.
Reports, correspondence, memoranda, lists, writings, clippings, and printed matter arranged alphabetically by subject.

did.unittitle: U.S. Department of Labor. Office of Research and Development. 1948-1973.

scopecontent.p: Reports, printed matter, correspondence, Department of Labor studies, writings, graphs, statistical data, clippings, and other material, arranged alphabetically by subject.
Correspondence, notes, memoranda, reports, newsletters, lists, clippings, and printed matter, arranged alphabetically by subject.
Writings of H. S. Kantor arranged alphabetically by title. Untitled writings arranged alphabetically by subject.
